front.title: Interworking between Digital Subscriber Signalling System No. one (DSS1) and Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) for basic call;

abstract.t: This document specifies the interworking between the Digital SubscriberSignalling System No.one (DSS1) as specified in [1] and the SessionInitiation Protocol (SIP) as specified in [2]. SIP is an Internetapplication-layer control protocol for creating, modifying, andterminating sessions with one or more participants. These sessionsinclude, in particular, telephone calls. The interworking SHALL bedescribed from DSS1 viewpoint for the basic call procedures.
